file_content.text: Men, fall back! Rally here!
My lord, what is the meaning of this? We are on the verge of striking a major blow to the Republic.
I am General Kligton, commanding on the authority of Sith Lord Rathari, appointed to Nar Shaddaa by the Dark Council! Why do you attack the Empire's men?
Where is your master hiding?
Tell me Rathari's location.
If Rathari shows himself, no one else will suffer.
I only want your master.
He is attending to other matters.
Lord Rathari is my enemy and everyone associated with him must die.
I'll kill you all.
You belong to Darth Baras.
I was given instructions to destroy you if you were foolish enough to show your face here.
You'd be wise to ignore those instructions.
That would be a mistake.
Oh, I think not. You are surrounded, and we far outnumber you.
I'm right here. Do what you must.
Consider my face shown.
My men are the best trained in the galaxy. You will be a minor interruption, and then I will finish obliterating the Republic garrison.
Let me save you the trouble.
Here's your chance. [Attack]
Full attack!
